pddl:
(:event TOAD-EATS-BEETLE
        :parameters (?t - toad ?b - beetle ?r - room ?c - container)
        :precondition (and
            (at ?t ?r)
            (at ?b ?r)
            (at ?c ?r)
            (or
                (not (in ?b ?c))
                (and
                    (in ?b ?c)
                    (open ?c)
                    )
                )
                (not (in ?b inventory)
            (hungry ?t)
            )
        :effect (and
            (not (at ?b ?r))
            (not (hungry ?t))
            )
    )
event_feedback: The {{ t }} ambles over to  {{ container_content }}
